Plot: In London for his daughter's wedding, a rumpled man finds his romantic spirits lifted by a new woman in his life.
Title: Last Chance Harvey
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Emma Thompson, Eileen Atkins, Kathy Baker
tomatoConsensus: Last Chance Harvey is an above-average story that graduates to potent romantic drama based on the chemistry and charm of its top-notch performers.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
